name: VoiceAssistApp
description: A voice-controlled accessibility app for hands-free mobile device control

infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: VoiceAssist needs microphone access to listen for voice commands
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: VoiceAssist needs camera access to take photos and videos
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: VoiceAssist needs contacts access to make calls and send messages
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: VoiceAssist needs location access for emergency services and navigation
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: VoiceAssist needs photo library access to save pictures
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: VoiceAssist needs speech recognition to understand voice commands
